timeline.bodyText: org.zaproxy.addon.graphql, being used for new add-ons.
timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,161 @@

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest GraphQl, having acronyms all uppercase makes it harder to read when there are several together (e.g. GraphQLAPI).
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: Should override canUnload and supportsDb to return true.
